REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f5626 reute d f BC-E-SYSTEMS-<ESY>-WINS 03-17 0041

TEXT.TITLE: E-SYSTEMS <ESY> WINS NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: E-Systems said it received a multi-year U.S. Navy contract for the continuing production of its military teleprinters for use in submarines. It said the contract is worth 9,208,223 dlrs. Reuter
